channel.title: How do other ppl join my server?(noob question)
channel.description:
ok i no this sounds really nooby but i really dont no how to let other ppl on??? i downloaded no-ip checked my server on run my server but ppl cant get on if they use silab i portforwarded too
WUT ELSE DO I GOTTA DO???

dont double post.

item.title: How do other ppl join my server?(noob question)
item.dc:creator: @sh1ft sh1ft
item.description:
@sh1ft wrote:

no ppl cant get in it
like if they type in my ip in silab they cant log on and i tryed entering on runelocus and they said its off[quote=“Omg iz ben, post:3, topic:289886”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=383204.msg2877268#msg2877268 date=1248120415]
Make sure you portforwarded correctly.
[/quote]
that.

and if u want people to join… advertise by putting your server on the status page.[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2009, 02:12:46 pm[/size][hr]i ported correctly
port 43594 is opened[quote=“Telenim, post:2, topic:289886”]Make sure you portforwarded correctly.[/quote]

Read full topic
